typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source2
Filter1, source2 lookup(source1@title == source2@title,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
source1 filter(instr(lower(title),'20,000 leagues under') != 0) ~> Filter1
